verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609> of David <WH1732>. I was glad <WH8055> <WH8804> when they said <WH559> <WH8802> unto me, Let us go <WH3212> <WH8799> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.
Our feet <WH7272> shall stand <WH5975> <WH8802> within thy gates <WH8179>, O Yerushalayim <WH3389>.
Yerushalayim <WH3389> is builded <WH1129> <WH8803> as a city <WH5892> that is compact <WH2266> <WH8795> together <WH3162>:

Whither <WH8033> the tribes <WH7626> go up <WH5927> <WH8804>, the tribes <WH7626> of the YY <WH3050>, unto the testimony <WH5715> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, to give thanks <WH3034> <WH8687> unto the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>.
For there are set <WH3427> <WH8804> thrones <WH3678> of judgment <WH4941>, the thrones <WH3678> of the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732>.
Pray <WH7592> <WH8798> for the peace <WH7965> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>: they shall prosper <WH7951> <WH8799> that love <WH157> <WH8802> thee.
Peace <WH7965> be within thy walls <WH2426>, and prosperity <WH7962> within thy palaces <WH759>.
For my brethren <WH251> and companions <WH7453> ' sakes, I will now say <WH1696> <WH8762>, Peace <WH7965> be within thee.
Because of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> I will seek <WH1245> <WH8762> thy good <WH2896>.
